mapper.select:
select
from tar_grp_import_task task WHERE STATUS = 1 AND status_cd = 1000 AND EXISTS (SELECT a.status FROM ci_custom_group_info a WHERE a.status = 1 AND a.custom_group_id = task.tar_grp_id) order by create_time LIMIT 1
